title: Civil liberties scores- Nigeria and China

content.question: <!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}--> Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe the trend in civil liberties in Nigeria between 1995 and 2015. Explain a possible reason for this trend. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about sources of authority in Nigeria. (c) Explain why the score for civil liberties in Nigeria differs from the score for civil liberties in China.

frqParts.text: <!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}--> Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe the trend in civil liberties in Nigeria between 1995 and 2015. Explain a possible reason for this trend. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about sources of authority in Nigeria. (c) Explain why the score for civil liberties in Nigeria differs from the score for civil liberties in China.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
